Uses of Package
org.divxdede.text.formatter

Packages that use org.divxdede.text.formatter
org.divxdede.text.formatter   
 

Classes in org.divxdede.text.formatter used by org.divxdede.text.formatter
PatternFormatter.ArgumentDetails
          Details how an argument must be formatted with more informations Flags that can modify the output format Width that give the minium number of characters Precision that restrict the number of characters (depend of the conversion)
PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace
          An arguments namespace allow to define custom conversion's identifiers instead of using defaults.
PatternFormatter.AttributeArgumentNameSpace
          AttributeArgumentNameSpace is a namespace binding conversion's identifier to a particular property of the argument.
PatternFormatter.Conversion
          Describe all conversion types managed by this formatter
PatternFormatter.DateTimeConversion
          Describe all date-time conversion's suffix modifiers
PatternFormatter.DetailedArgumentNameSpace
          This extended implementation of ArgumentNameSpace allow to control more informations on arguments like: Flags that can modify the output format Width that give the minium number of characters Precision that restrict the number of characters (depend of the conversion)
PatternFormatter.Flags
          Represent flags set usable for an ArgumentDetails This class is compatible with the java.util.Formatter$Flags class in bit values and can be used with java.util.Formattable objects Flags can't be instanciate directly.
PatternFormatter.Pattern
          Compiled pattern form.
